name: places/ChIJ___bpZVZwokR1DNI-q4Btsc
formattedAddress: 247 W 11th St #102, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 247 W 11th St #102, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Compact outpost offering deep-tissue, Thai & other massage therapy services in a relaxed atmosphere.

originalText.text: Agnes is the best in the business.  I have had massages all over the world and have never had a therapist as skilled and effective as Agnes.  Her technique is top notch and she can use as much strength as you can handle if that's what you're looking for.  Agnes is extremely knowledgeable, not only about massage therapy, but about the body and wellness generally.  I have been seeing Agnes for years and she has been instrumental in improving my back and neck pain.  Her friendly and compassionate demeanor only adds to the amazing experience of every visit.    I highly recommend Agnes!

originalText.text: I have been a regular patient of Agnes for almost a year now - she is hands down, the BEST at what she does. She has helped me so much with back and upper trap issues, as well as neck issues, and has been INCREDIBLY insightful and helpful when it comes to overall wellness guidance (for example, I purchased her herbal remedy for allergies and it cured me FULLY of my awful, hindering, allergies!). Agnes caters her treatment approach per patient, making sure she is utilizing the best form of practice per patient/issue which I value tremendously, because she clearly takes the time to make sure she is doing everything she can to treat whichever area is affected. In addition to all of this, she is the absolute sweetest and warmest woman!  If you are suffering from any physical ailment, or feeling you need some sort of a body-reset, go to Agnes...you won't regret it!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Teva Massage. I’ve been going to Agnes for acupuncture and massage for over a year. With long work hours, stress and frequent travel, I’ve had many massages over the years, and Agnes is in a league of her own. She is by far the best. She is incredibly knowledgeable and shares insights and tips on the human body and holistic wellness. She also takes a unique approach and focuses on long-term relief. On my first visit, Agnes gave me suggestions on posture, which I still think about daily. I’d never tried acupuncture before meeting Agnes, and her approach has made a huge difference. The appointments are easy to book online, and Agnes takes insurance. I recently moved out of NYC, but I return to Agnes on my frequent work visits. She is phenomenal, and I know I will not receive the same level of expertise and thoughtful care elsewhere

originalText.text: Agnes is a fantastic massage therapist and I would HIGHLY recommend her! As someone who does yoga and strength training pretty intensely on a regular basis, I have my share of post-workout muscle soreness. Agnes is an invaluable partner in helping me maintain my muscle tone and overall flexibility. She's extremely knowledgable and intuitive about the human body. While she is absolutely professional and totally focused on you and your needs, she is also one of the nicest people you'll ever meet. She knows how to put you at ease. I always leave feeling lighter, more relaxed, and more connected to my body. Thank you Agnes!

originalText.text:
I have been a client of Agnes for in excess of 10 years.
Initially, we scheduled deep tissue sport massage appointments once a month.  As time passed, Agnes earned my trust and respect as she perfected her existing techniques and constantly worked toward additional and more advanced methods of healing.  I have yet to find another therapist who provides a service comparable to the consistent standard Agnes offers.  I have always believed Agnes to be on of the best and talented individuals in her field, but my expectations were recently surpassed this year.
After struggling with unbearable back pain and issues with my hip for a year, I decided it was time to seek a medical assessment. After countless doctor visits, MRI’s, and physical therapy, I made no progress toward recovery.  I began to accept the pain, as in hindered many daily activities.

I suffered through these issues and decided to change my approach from meeting with various doctors and specialists to trying a new alternative.  I contacted Agnes and explained my situation.  I asked if we could please schedule an appointment and we did.  She not only listened, but spent time researching and understanding potential causes of my pain, before we had our first session for the specific matter.  After only two sessions comprised of a combination of massage and acupuncture, the pain has ceased, and I have resumed my normal routine.
